name: Barbell Back Squat
notes: Keep chest up, core braced, knees tracking over toes. Lower until thighs are parallel to floor or lower.

name: Barbell Front Squat
notes: Barbell rests on front deltoids. Keep torso upright throughout movement.

name: Romanian Deadlift
notes: Keep legs mostly straight. Hinge at hips, push hips back. Feel stretch in hamstrings.

name: Conventional Deadlift
notes: Full body compound movement. Keep back straight, drive through heels.

name: Barbell Bench Press
notes: Lower bar to chest, press up explosively. Keep feet on floor, maintain arch.

name: Barbell Overhead Press
notes: Press bar overhead, keep core tight. Full lockout at top.

name: Barbell Row
notes: Pull bar to lower chest/upper abs. Squeeze shoulder blades together.

name: Barbell Bicep Curl
notes: Curl bar up, control on the way down. Keep elbows stationary.

name: Barbell Tricep Extension
notes: Lower bar behind head, extend overhead. Keep elbows in.

name: Barbell Calf Raise
notes: Rise up on toes, hold peak contraction, lower slowly.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
notes: Greater range of motion than barbell. Control the weight throughout.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
notes: Press dumbbells overhead simultaneously or alternating.

name: Dumbbell Row
notes: One arm at a time. Pull elbow back, squeeze lat.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
notes: Can be done standing, seated, alternating, or simultaneously.

name: Dumbbell Tricep Extension
notes: Overhead extension. Keep elbows close to head.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
notes: Raise arms to sides until parallel to floor. Control the descent.

name: Dumbbell Front Raise
notes: Raise dumbbell forward until arm is parallel to floor.

name: Dumbbell Goblet Squat
notes: Hold one dumbbell at chest. Great for beginners to learn squat form.

name: Dumbbell Lunges
notes: Step forward, lower back knee toward ground. Keep front knee over ankle.

name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift
notes: Easier to learn than barbell version. Focus on hip hinge.

name: Dumbbell Calf Raise
notes: Hold dumbbells at sides, rise up on toes.

name: Cable Chest Fly
notes: Constant tension. Bring handles together in front of chest.

name: Cable Crossover
notes: Similar to fly but crossing over in front.

name: Cable Lat Pulldown
notes: Pull bar to upper chest. Lean back slightly, drive elbows down.

name: Cable Row
notes: Pull handle to torso. Squeeze shoulder blades together.

name: Cable Bicep Curl
notes: Constant tension throughout movement. Great for pump.

name: Cable Tricep Pushdown
notes: Push handle down, keep elbows at sides. Full extension at bottom.

name: Cable Lateral Raise
notes: Constant tension. One arm at a time or with cable crossover setup.

name: Cable Woodchopper
notes: Pull cable across body in chopping motion. Great for core rotation.

name: Machine Chest Press
notes: Guided movement, good for beginners. Focus on controlled reps.

name: Machine Shoulder Press
notes: Seated machine press. Safer than free weights for beginners.

name: Machine Row
notes: Seated row machine. Pull to torso, squeeze lats.

name: Machine Leg Press
notes: Can handle heavy weight safely. Lower until knees at 90 degrees.

name: Machine Leg Extension
notes: Isolate quads. Control both up and down phases.

name: Machine Leg Curl
notes: Can be lying or seated. Isolate hamstrings effectively.

name: Machine Calf Raise
notes: Seated or standing calf raise machine. Full range of motion.

name: Machine Hip Abduction
notes: Push legs apart against resistance. Strengthen outer thighs.

name: Machine Hip Adduction
notes: Bring legs together against resistance. Inner thigh strengthening.

name: Pull-ups
notes: Pull body up until chin over bar. Full hang at bottom.

name: Chin-ups
notes: Underhand grip. More bicep emphasis than pull-ups.

name: Push-ups
notes: Keep body straight, lower until chest nearly touches ground.

name: Dips
notes: Lower body by bending arms, push back up. Keep torso upright for tricep focus.

name: Bodyweight Squat
notes: Fundamental movement. Lower until thighs parallel to floor.

name: Walking Lunges
notes: Step forward into lunge, push off front foot, repeat with other leg.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
notes: Rear foot elevated. Great unilateral leg exercise.

name: Glute Bridge
notes: Lie on back, lift hips by squeezing glutes. Hold at top.

name: Single Leg Glute Bridge
notes: One leg extended. More challenging version of glute bridge.

name: Plank
notes: Hold straight body position. Keep core tight, don't sag.

name: Side Plank
notes: Hold body in straight line on side. Great for obliques.

name: Crunch
notes: Lift shoulders off ground, crunch abs. Don't pull on neck.

name: Russian Twist
notes: Rotate torso side to side. Can add weight for difficulty.

name: Mountain Climbers
notes: Alternate bringing knees to chest. Great cardio and core.

name: Burpee
notes: Squat, plank, push-up, jump. Full body conditioning.

name: Jump Squat
notes: Explosive squat with jump at top. Plyometric movement.

name: Calf Raise (Bodyweight)
notes: Rise up on toes. Can do on floor or edge of step for greater range.

name: Hip Thrust
notes: Upper back on bench, drive hips up. Squeeze glutes at top.

name: Kettlebell Swing
notes: Hip hinge movement, swing KB to chest height. Not a squat.

name: Kettlebell Goblet Squat
notes: Hold KB at chest. Great for learning squat form.

name: Kettlebell Turkish Get-Up
notes: Complex movement. Stand up while holding KB overhead. Full body stability.

name: Kettlebell Snatch
notes: Explosive movement. Swing KB overhead in one motion.

name: Kettlebell Row
notes: Bent over row with KB. Great unilateral work.

name: Resistance Band Pull-Apart
notes: Pull band apart at chest level. Great for rear delts and posture.

name: Resistance Band Bicep Curl
notes: Stand on band, curl handles up. Portable and versatile.

name: Resistance Band Chest Press
notes: Anchor band behind you, press forward. Great for home workouts.

name: Resistance Band Lateral Raise
notes: Stand on band, raise handles to sides. Constant tension.

name: Resistance Band Squat
notes: Band around legs or under feet. Adds resistance to bodyweight squat.

name: Resistance Band Glute Bridge
notes: Band around legs above knees. Push knees out while bridging.

name: Medicine Ball Slam
notes: Lift ball overhead, slam down explosively. Great for power and core.

name: Medicine Ball Russian Twist
notes: Hold MB, rotate side to side. More challenging than bodyweight version.

name: Medicine Ball Wall Ball
notes: Squat with MB, throw to wall target. Full body power movement.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
notes: Bench at 30-45 degree angle. Targets upper chest.

name: Decline Dumbbell Press
notes: Bench declined. Targets lower chest.

name: Dumbbell Fly
notes: Open arms wide, bring together over chest. Can be flat, incline, or decline.

name: Dumbbell Pullover
notes: Lie across bench, lower DB behind head, pull over chest.

name: Dumbbell Shrug
notes: Lift shoulders straight up. Hold at top, lower slowly.

name: Dumbbell Hammer Curl
notes: Neutral grip. Targets brachialis, builds thicker arms.

name: Dumbbell Concentration Curl
notes: Seated, elbow on thigh. Isolates bicep effectively.

name: Dumbbell Tricep Kickback
notes: Bent over, extend arm back. Isolate tricep.

name: Dumbbell Overhead Tricep Extension
notes: Hold DB overhead, lower behind head, extend up.

name: Dumbbell Rear Delt Fly
notes: Bent over, raise arms to sides. Targets rear delts.

name: Dumbbell Arnold Press
notes: Start with palms facing you, rotate and press overhead.

name: Dumbbell Upright Row
notes: Pull DBs up to chest level. Keep close to body.

name: Dumbbell Step-Up
notes: Step up onto bench/box while holding DBs. Drive through heel.

name: Dumbbell Bulgarian Split Squat
notes: Rear foot elevated, holding DBs. Excellent unilateral leg work.

name: Dumbbell Sumo Squat
notes: Wide stance, toes pointed out. Hold one DB between legs.

name: Dumbbell Good Morning
notes: DB behind neck, hinge at hips. Keep back straight.

name: Dumbbell Stiff Leg Deadlift
notes: Keep legs straight, hinge at hips. Feel hamstring stretch.

name: Dumbbell Farmer's Walk
notes: Carry heavy DBs while walking. Great for grip and core.

name: Dumbbell Wrist Curl
notes: Forearms on bench, curl wrists up. Strengthen forearms.

name: Dumbbell Reverse Wrist Curl
notes: Reverse grip, curl wrists up. Target extensors.

name: Barbell Overhead Squat
notes: Barbell overhead while squatting. Requires mobility and stability.

name: Barbell Hack Squat
notes: Barbell behind legs. Unique quad-focused squat variation.

name: Barbell Sumo Deadlift
notes: Wide stance deadlift. More glute and adductor emphasis.

name: Barbell Hip Thrust
notes: Upper back on bench, bar across hips. Drive hips up. Best glute builder.

name: Barbell Good Morning
notes: Barbell on upper back, hinge at hips. Keep back straight.

name: Barbell Incline Bench Press
notes: Bench at 30-45 degrees. Targets upper chest.

name: Barbell Decline Bench Press
notes: Bench declined. Targets lower chest.

name: Barbell Close Grip Bench Press
notes: Hands shoulder-width apart. Excellent tricep builder.

name: Barbell Upright Row
notes: Pull bar to upper chest. Keep close to body.

name: Barbell Shrug
notes: Lift shoulders straight up. Hold peak contraction.

name: Barbell Reverse Curl
notes: Overhand grip curl. Targets forearms and brachialis.

name: Barbell Wrist Curl
notes: Forearms on bench, curl wrists. Strengthen forearms.

name: Cable Face Pull
notes: Pull cable to face level, external rotation. Great for rear delts and posture.

name: Cable Upright Row
notes: Constant tension upright row. Smooth movement.

name: Cable Rear Delt Fly
notes: Bent over, pull cables to sides. Isolate rear delts.

name: Cable Hammer Curl
notes: Neutral grip curl with cable. Constant tension.

name: Cable Overhead Tricep Extension
notes: Rope attachment overhead. Full tricep extension.

name: Cable Crunch
notes: Kneel, pull cable down while crunching. Add resistance to abs.

name: Cable Oblique Crunch
notes: Side crunch with cable. Target obliques with resistance.

name: Cable Leg Extension
notes: Sit, extend leg against cable resistance. Isolate quads.

name: Cable Leg Curl
notes: Stand or lie, curl heel to glutes against cable.

name: Cable Calf Raise
notes: Rise up on toes with cable resistance. Constant tension.

name: Machine Pec Deck
notes: Fly machine. Bring arms together, squeeze chest.

name: Machine Reverse Pec Deck
notes: Reverse fly machine. Target rear delts.

name: Machine Preacher Curl
notes: Preacher bench machine. Isolate biceps effectively.

name: Machine Tricep Dip
notes: Assisted dip machine. Great for building up to bodyweight dips.

name: Machine Hack Squat
notes: Guided squat machine. Can handle very heavy weight safely.

name: Machine Sled Leg Press
notes: 45-degree leg press. Safer than free weight squats for heavy loads.

name: Machine Glute Kickback
notes: Kick leg back against resistance. Isolate glutes.

name: Pistol Squat
notes: Single leg squat. Requires strength, balance, and mobility.

name: Handstand Push-up
notes: Push-up in handstand position. Extremely challenging.

name: Muscle-up
notes: Pull-up transitioning to dip. Requires significant strength.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
notes: Hang from bar, raise legs. Great for lower abs.

name: L-sit
notes: Hold body in L shape. Requires core and hip flexor strength.

name: Dragon Flag
notes: Hold body straight, lower and raise. Extremely challenging core exercise.

name: Single Leg Calf Raise
notes: One leg at a time. Unilateral calf work.

name: Wall Sit
notes: Hold squat position against wall. Isometric quad builder.

name: Single Leg Hip Thrust
notes: One leg extended. Challenging unilateral glute work.

name: Nordic Curl
notes: Knees anchored, lower body forward. Eccentric hamstring strength.

name: Single Arm Farmer's Walk
notes: Carry one heavy DB. Challenges core stability and grip unilaterally.

name: Single Arm Overhead Carry
notes: Carry DB overhead while walking. Stability and shoulder strength.

name: Dumbbell Suitcase Carry
notes: Carry DB at side. Challenges core anti-lateral flexion.

name: Kettlebell Farmer's Walk
notes: Carry KBs while walking. Grip and core strength.

name: Kettlebell Rack Carry
notes: Hold KBs in rack position. Shoulder and core stability.

name: Barbell Farmer's Walk
notes: Carry heavy barbells. Ultimate grip and core challenge.

name: Wide Grip Pull-up
notes: Wider than shoulder width grip. More lat emphasis.

name: Close Grip Pull-up
notes: Hands close together. More bicep emphasis.

name: Archer Pull-up
notes: Pull to one side, other arm extended. Advanced unilateral pull-up.

name: Diamond Push-up
notes: Hands form diamond shape. More tricep emphasis than regular push-up.

name: Archer Push-up
notes: Push to one side, other arm extended. Advanced unilateral push-up.

name: Pike Push-up
notes: Feet elevated or pike position. Targets shoulders like overhead press.

name: Incline Push-up
notes: Hands on elevated surface. Easier than floor push-ups, good progression.

name: Decline Push-up
notes: Feet elevated. More challenging, targets upper chest more.

name: Single Leg Glute Bridge Hold
notes: Hold glute bridge position with one leg. Isometric glute strength.

name: Reverse Lunge
notes: Step backward into lunge. Easier on knees than forward lunge.

name: Lateral Lunge
notes: Step to side into lunge. Targets adductors and inner thighs.

name: Reverse Crunch
notes: Lift knees to chest. Targets lower abs.

name: Bicycle Crunch
notes: Alternate bringing elbow to opposite knee. Great for obliques.

name: Dead Bug
notes: Lie on back, extend opposite arm and leg. Core stability.

name: Bird Dog
notes: On hands and knees, extend opposite arm and leg. Core and glute stability.

name: Superman
notes: Lie face down, lift arms and legs. Strengthen posterior chain.

name: Reverse Hyperextension
notes: Lying face down, lift legs. Hamstring and glute strengthener.

name: Calf Raise on Step
notes: Heels hanging off step, greater range of motion. Stretch at bottom.

name: Single Leg Calf Raise on Step
notes: One leg, heels off step. Unilateral calf work with full ROM.
